channel.title: Comments on: A new sense of calm
channel.description: tales in the life of Madeline Ann Downey

item.title: By: great aunti linny
item.dc:creator: great aunti linny
item.description: Madeline is the cutest baby and I think she is posing cause her mommy and daddy take so many pictures. You all look so very happy and Madeline is becoming a little lady....cant wait to see her and you guys tooo!!!!! Great aunti Linny
item.content:encoded: Madeline is the cutest baby and I think she is posing cause her mommy and daddy take so many pictures. You all look so very happy and Madeline is becoming a little lady….cant wait to see her and you guys tooo!!!!! Great aunti Linny

item.title: By: alma vogt
item.dc:creator: alma vogt
item.description: Hi Madeline, You don't know me but here in Spokane we enjoy reading your comments as life goes on. You are beautiful and charming.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Madeline,
You don’t know me but here in Spokane we enjoy reading your comments as life goes on. You are beautiful and charming.
